title: Interpretation of a dream about licorice

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about licorice in a dream by Al-Osaimi Since licorice is one of the old types of drinks that the Arabs have known since ancient times, and it is still traded in the markets until now, it is a healthy drink and you may also be interested in the deceased father in a dream, and watching it in a dream is one of the things that worries the viewer, as licorice is a black drink and varies according to its taste, smell and the condition of the person who drinks it, so there is a constant search for interpretations of seeing licorice in a dream. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream Interpretation of a dream about licorice in a dream by Al-Osaimi Interpretation of a dream about licorice in a dream by Al-Osaimi According to what was mentioned in the interpretations of Sheikh Al-Osaimi, the interpretation of seeing a dream about licorice in a dream is as follows: Eating licorice in a dream represents a cure for the patient and indicates getting rid of pain, fatigue, hardship and suffering. Sweet-tasting licorice expresses joy and happiness for the one who drinks it. Licorice is a drink whose expiration date can be known on the box. When you see the expiration date of this drink in a dream, this vision indicates a great warning to the visionary about something that will threaten his life and may cause his death. Offering a cold, sweet-tasting licorice to a married woman in a dream indicates the approach of a very happy occasion for that family. Offering hot licorice to unmarried people The vision indicates the dissolution of her engagement due to her relationship with a person who is not suitable for marriage. Read also: Penguin in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of licorice in a dream for a married womanDiscussion of our topicInterpretation of a dream of licorice in a dream of Al-OsaimiIt is necessary to know the interpretation of a dream of licorice in a dream for a married woman, as the interpretation is as follows:When a married woman sees herself bringing licorice to her home, this vision portends kindness and nourishment in that home.Eating warm licorice in a dream indicates many conflicts with her children and husband on a daily basis. Read also: Washing the deadInterpretation of seeing licorice in a dream for a manSheikh Al-Osaimi interpreted seeing licorice in a dream for a man as follows:Sweet licorice in a man's dream indicates that he will take a high position in his work, and eating licorice Cold represents obtaining material gains without any difficulty. Hot licorice in a man's dream represents a lot of money, but behind it lies hardship, fatigue and intense effort. Expired and spoiled licorice in a man's dream expresses the financial crises that this person is going through in his life. Interpretation of seeing licorice in a dream for a single woman Sheikh Al-Osaimi explained the vision of licorice in a dream for an unmarried woman as follows: Spoiled licorice in the dream of an unmarried woman represents failure in her studies and failure to fulfill the desires she was striving for, and this vision can also represent the end of the engagement without clear reasons. Eating licorice for a single woman indicates that she enjoys a high position at work. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream Interpretation of a dream about licorice in a pregnant woman's dream The dream of licorice in a dream can be interpreted for a pregnant woman, according to what Sheikh Al-Osaimi interpreted

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a white dog in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a white dog in a dream Seeing dogs in real life is a frightening topic for many people, and for others they consider it a favorite pet and cannot do without it in their home and life, such as when you see them in a dream, it is not necessary that this be a sign of something scary, but rather It is possible that this is an indication of the presence of goodness in the future, and the interpretation of a dream of a white dog in a dream has several indicators that vary according to the social status of the viewer, the color of the dog, etc. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a white dog in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Shirin is considered one of the most prominent scholars of interpretation, as his interpretations were distinguished, such as Interpretation of the dream of seeing a white dog in a dream by Ibn Shirin. Seeing a white dog in a dream being eaten by a fortune teller means that this person will suffer many losses in his life. Whoever is able to escape from these white dogs in his dream shows the great goodness that will come and the return of his rights from the one who wronged him. And also from those who wronged him. He saw that he was sharing the food with dogs, then this is evidence that there is harm in his life, and he must return to God Almighty. Also, seeing many dogs chasing the sleeper, this indicates that there are evil people in his life who are chasing him and trying to harm him. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a white dog for a woman Single: The color of the dog in the dream plays a role in the interpretation of the dream. The interpretation of a woman’s dream of seeing a white dog in a dream is different if it is black. Seeing herself taking care of the white dog after entering her house indicates that God saved her from the danger that someone was searching for. Also, if she sees that she does not approach dogs when she sees them, this indicates her reserve. Always dealing with people. Her feeling of fear of a dog in a dream indicates that she discovered the truth about some people and quickly moved away from them. Seeing dogs chasing them during their sleep warns them to take the necessary precautions and stay away from some people. Also, seeing a dog chasing her indicates the presence of a person. A close person in her life seeks to harm her and get her into trouble. In addition, the dog’s pursuit of her can be interpreted through problems that will appear in the future. Interpretation of a dream about white dogs for a married woman: A person’s social status plays an important role in interpreting the dream, as the interpretation of a dream about white dogs for a married woman differs from Others. If a woman dreams that her partner gives her a white dog, this indicates that he will give her a beautiful and valuable gift. But if this white dog that was given to her was a wild dog, this indicates that the husband is cheating on his partner. Also, seeing a married woman with a white dog in Her house indicates that her problems will be solved and she will live comfortably soon. If a married woman sees a white dog covered in dirt trying to approach her, this indicates that there are bad people seeking to destroy her life. Interpretation of a dream about white dogs for a pregnant woman Pregnancy is considered one of the periods full of thoughts and dreams about what the fetus is and what not. For a pregnant woman, this is the interpretation of a dream about white dogs for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant white dog in a dream indicates stability in the coming period of her life and

title: The 50 most important interpretations of a dream about wearing a red dress by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Wearing a red dress in a dream. Red is usually one of the colors that most people love and has a positive effect on the soul. In this article, all the dreamers’ interpretations will be clarified according to their condition. Wearing a red dress in a dream Wearing a red dress in a dream means that the dreamer will soon hear the news. Al-Sara. Wearing a red dress in a dream shows the dreamer that she is an intelligent and strong person and is making a lot of efforts to achieve her goals. If the dreamer is a married woman, this is a sign that she is about to become pregnant. When the dreamer sees in her dream that she is wearing a red dress, this indicates that God loves her. I am close to him and I do not commit sins. Wearing a red dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets wearing a red dress in a dream as good news and the satisfaction of the dreamer. Wearing a red dress in a dream indicates one’s intelligence and the necessity of taking full advantage of these abilities in order to realize one’s ambitions and achieve Its full goals. It has also become clear to the world that if an unmarried girl dreams of wearing a red dress, this is a sign of joy and the approaching date of her wedding. Wearing a red dress in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl dreams of wearing a red dress in her dream about the approaching date of her wedding in the event that she is engaged, but if she is not engaged This indicates that she will soon be associated with a young man of good character. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is wearing a red woolen dress in her dream, then this vision is considered a sign of her marriage to a young man with whom they had a passionate love relationship, and this relationship will soon culminate in marriage. When a separated girl dreams To wear a red cotton dress, this is a sign of excellence, progress in her studies, and obtaining the highest grades. Wearing a long red dress in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees herself wearing a long red dress in a dream, this is a sign that she will soon marry a beautiful young man if she is engaged. , but if she is not engaged, then this is a sign that he will be engaged. Seeing a girl wearing a long red dress in her dream symbolizes that she is superior, intelligent, and gets high grades in her studies. Also, a long red dress in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she is good and has good behavior. And everyone loves her. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a short red dress for a single woman. When an unmarried girl dreams of wearing a short red dress, this means that a young man will propose to her and he does not suit her, which may create some problems and crises in her life. Seeing a separated girl wearing a short red dress symbolizes Her negligence in performing religious duties and far from God and the straight path, and this dream serves as a warning to return to the straight path. If the short red dress that the unmarried girl is wearing is elegant and beautiful, this indicates that she will be surprised by the happy news that will spread joy in her soul. Seeing a single girl Wearing a short red dress indicates that she loves someone and cannot express these feelings to him. Wearing a red dress in a dream for a married woman when she sees

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a large crowd of people in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream to see a large crowd of people in a dream. The presence of many people in a limited place is only on occasions, whether they are happy or sad, and crowds of people gather within a certain scope for the purpose of protesting against something in the form of peaceful demonstrations and protests, and it can It falls under it, it is among the stances of support for a particular topic or idea, but what is the meaning of seeing this in a dream? In this article we will explain the interpretation of the dream of seeing a large crowd of people in a dream. The interpretation of the dream of seeing a large crowd of people in a dream about a pregnant woman. The term crowd is used to indicate To a large number of people who gather or are present in a specific place, for a specific purpose or to convey a specific opinion or idea. In this context, we explain to you the interpretation of the dream of seeing a large crowd of people in a dream about a pregnant woman: When a pregnant woman sees a large crowd of people in her dream, this means that the pregnancy period will go well, without difficulties and problems. Also, seeing a crowd of people in a dream for a woman Pregnant is an indication that the birth will be easy and you will have a safe and healthy baby. But seeing a crowd of strangers is a sign that her condition will improve and her affairs will be at ease. While her vision of feeding food to a crowd of people and gathering people shows that kindness, blessing and money will come soon. See also Interpretation of a dream Seeing a kiss or a kiss in a dream by Ibn Sirinma. Interpretation of seeing demonstrations in a dream? We often hear about demonstrations and protests taking place in different regions of the world for various reasons: such as smashing the ruling class, rejecting its dictatorial style of rule, protesting difficult living conditions, or deteriorating economic conditions. . Protests can be based on racial discrimination. Ethnic, religious, religious, etc., but what is the interpretation of seeing demonstrations in a dream: Seeing demonstrations in a dream means that the dreamer will get rid of the obstacles that stand in his way. If the dreamer is oppressed and his rights are taken away, then the vision is a sign of obtaining his rights. Also, seeing the same person demonstrating In a dream, it is evidence that he will have a peaceful and quiet life. He will also be able to continue on the path with great resolve and determination in the face of injustice and tyranny. While seeing people protesting in a dream is a sign of many dangers to which the dreamer will be exposed, and he must take the necessary measures to preserve himself. And its location. On the other hand, witnessing an injury in one of the demonstrations indicates that the viewer will suffer a financial loss. See also the interpretation of the dream of seeing amulets in a dream and their interpretations. What is the interpretation of seeing strangers in a dream? A person may meet in his life people he has never seen before, where no connection has been made to Previous knowledge of them. These people can be described as strangers and have the meaning of seeing a stranger or strange people in a dream, and here we will explain the meaning of seeing strangers in a dream: When a person sees strangers in his dream, his interpretation of abundant sustenance and kindness will soon come to the dreamer’s life. According to Ibn Sirin, it can indicate This leads to peace of mind and calm. If the fortuneteller eats with strangers, this indicates the charitable work that he is doing

title: Interpretation of the letter J in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: The letter J in a dream. The letter J is an Arabic letter and cannot have a classical Arabic alphabet, but it is used in some dialects of Iraq and Egypt and in other functions with this letter, and the letter J carries many important symbols and instructions, including seeing beauty. And buffalo, mountain, cheese, cave, plaster, locust, and watercress. Until the end of the instructions and codes. The letter Jem J in a dream and the forehead is the front of the head, and it is a sign of pride and prestige to see it in a dream, and the light on the forehead indicates justice in the conditions of the Prophet, his obedience, and exaltation. The head is glory and strength. The dream of a buffalo in a dream of Imam al-Sadiq, letter J, J, in a dream. Imam Jaafar al-Sadiq mentioned that he sees a buffalo in a dream, and he is dreaming of a vision that he wants to realize, work hard with, and achieve what he wants. An example of hard work. The dream of plaster in the dream of Imam al-Sadiq. The plaster in the dream is a symbol of intelligence, strength, and a permanent position, God willing, because it indicates the stability of the family and the good condition of the husband and children, because it indicates the recovery of the disease from the base. The mountain in the dream of Imam al-Sadiq, the letter C in the dream and the mountain. In a dream, it is a symbol of cruelty, and the mountain in a woman’s dream symbolizes a cruel husband and shows his strict and fiery heart. The dream of a single woman dreams of a mountain above a cruel husband with whom she gets tired. The mountain in a man’s dream is a symbol of a woman. With a sharp, solid, strong, arrogant personality, and God knows best. A dream about cheese in a dream of Imam Al-Sadiq Cheese in a dream is a sign of marriage in a girl’s dream, especially when she sees that eating cheese has a delicious taste and smell, and cheese in a dream portends a happy event, perhaps this is a sign of pregnancy for the girl. A married woman and ease of childbirth for a pregnant woman. Locusts in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq. Locusts in a dream are a person who suffers from many torments, pains, difficulties and challenges. The dream of introducing Imam Al-Sadiq. Letter C in a dream and the forehead is the front of the head, and it is of pride and prestige to see it in a dream, and the light on the forehead. The conditions of the Prophet, his obedience, and his exaltation. The head is glory and strength.Dream of watercress by Imam al-Sadiq Watercress in a dream is for a good human life, but eating watercress in a dream portends dire consequences, and warns against strong opinions, and God knows best.Rat in a dream by Imam al-SadiqThe dream of a rat represents hypocrisy and immoral living. Dreaming of eating a mouse represents searching for gossip. God knows best. The bell in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq. The bell in a dream is one of the meanings of alerting or drawing attention to what he has lost. It also symbolizes imminent travel and a symbol of accomplishing things. The eyelids in a dream of Imam al-Sadiq. The eyelid is one of the symbols with multiple interpretations, as long as the eyelid is healthy and does not suffer from wounds. Or diseases, this may indicate a good condition, but if the eyelid is injured or injured or causes pain and trouble or sadness and anxiety, and God knows best. Socks in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqThe letter J in a dream of Socks is known as a symbol of money or protection in exchange for money. In the field of buying socks, anxiety and fear disappear. As for wearing socks, it indicates the loss of money. Other indications for the word “jam” for Imam Al-Sadiq: The spy is a sign

Socks in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqThe letter J in a dream of Socks is known as a symbol of money or protection in exchange for money. In the field of buying socks, anxiety and fear disappear. As for wearing socks, it indicates the loss of money. Other indications for the word “jam” for Imam Al-Sadiq: The spy is a sign

title: Interpretation of seeing swimming in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing swimming in a dream Swimming is considered a sport that many people love and are interested in learning and practicing, and it has many benefits that keep the body fit and healthy. Case by case depending on the dreamer’s condition, we will explain all cases and interpretations in the following article: Seeing swimming in a dream Seeing swimming in the dreamer’s dream indicates that there are many crises in his life that negatively affect his psychological state. If the dreamer finds swimming very difficult, this symbolizes that he He faced many obstacles in his way and could not easily achieve his dreams. Swimming in the deep sea in a dream indicates that the visionary is searching for information about things that he has no right to know. Floating in a clear and clean sea shows the dreamer’s peace of mind and his kind treatment of those around him and that he is living a life Full of peace and comfort. Swimming in the river in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s satisfaction with the decree of our Lord, his acceptance of everything that happens in his life, his commitment to religious rules, and his closeness to God. If the dreamer sees that he is floating in the opposite direction of the water, this symbolizes that he will fall into many Problems and he will face financial difficulties for a period of time. Swimming on the back in the dreamer’s dream indicates the dominance of illusions over the dreamer’s head and his pursuit of a mirage that has nothing to do with reality. Swimming in a narrow pool means that the visionary will be exposed to many difficulties and problems that he will not be able to get rid of except after suffering damage. Dreaming of someone swimming in a swimming pool during the winter is a sign of the approaching date of his encounter with God. Seeing swimming in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted swimming in a dream as an indication that he will obtain a lot of sustenance and money, and that he will also be freed from all his worries and sorrows. If the dreamer floats in the water that contains many pearls and coral reefs, this indicates that he will earn a lot of profits which will improve his financial situation. Seeing the dreamer swimming in a salty sea symbolizes his will to distance himself from all the sins and wrong actions he commits and repent to God. Swimming in the winter is a sign that the visionary will suffer from a serious illness that will cause his health to deteriorate. Swimming with fish in a dream indicates that he will get a lot of good things and will be able to achieve all his goals and ambitions. Seeing an unmarried young man swimming in his dream is a sign that his marriage to A girl with good morals and he will be able to get all the things he wants to get. Seeing the dreamer swimming with a child he does not know in a pool of water in a dream means that he is a good person who has enough courage and honesty in all the relationships he enters into. A father who swims with his son in The dream symbolizes the father’s ability to bear the responsibility on his shoulders in a good way and his desire to meet all his needs and demands. Seeing swimming in a dream by Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi mentioned that seeing him swimming in deep blue water and swimming flawlessly in a dream indicates that he will reap the fruits of his work and enjoy many blessings and many good deeds. The dreamer is in the pond and is able to

title: Interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream is one of the characteristics, but it has a special meaning or significance for its appearance in the dream, because the world of dreams is a vast world full of symbols and secrets, and when something strange and out of place appears, this indicates its presence. It is a message to the dreamer, and it should be noted that dreams vary depending on the social and psychological circumstances, as well as the material and practical circumstances of the viewer, and in general if the smell of perfume is beautiful, then this vision is praiseworthy and not unacceptable and we will refer below to different interpretations of scholars for seeing perfumes in a dream. It may be Also interested in the following: Bathing in a dreamInterpretation of seeing perfume in a dreamThe scholar Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of the dream of seeing perfume varies depending on the sources from which the perfume is emanated in the dream, such as the smell of perfume, the smell of roses, the smell of incense, and others. Ibn Sirin also interprets the fragrant smell as meaning that the person will receive a lot Of money, food, and kindness. And if the dreamer is poor and dreams that he sees himself in a dream wearing perfume, this indicates that he will obtain a large and abundant livelihood. But if the monarch dreams that he buys perfume, but he cheats, this means that someone will do it, but he will break this promise. But if the fortuneteller sells the perfume while he is cheating, then this indicates that he made a promise to someone, but he broke that promise. In general, perfume in a dream indicates success, effort, success, sustenance, and love for people, according to the interpretation of the scholar Ibn Sirin. As for whoever dreams of breaking a bottle of perfume, this vision is undesirable. And unpleasant, this indicates a lack and interruption of livelihood, as well as harm that will befall the dreamer. If the dreamer sees himself perfumed with clothes or that his clothes smell fragrant, this indicates the goals that he will achieve in the future, but they will take some time. Pregnancy in a dreamInterpretation of seeing perfume in a dream from Before the scholar Al-NabulsiThe scholar Al-Nabulsi says that the fragrant smell in a dream indicates good behavior among people, as well as the source of halal money for the fortuneteller. If the dreamer dreams in a dream that smoke is coming out of perfume, this is a sign of the presence of problems and fears that will disturb the dreamer. Al-Nabulsi also says that Perfume in a dream in general indicates food, goodness, and abundance of money, which the dreamer will receive, especially if he is waiting for it in reality, and if he expects the good of the happy, then the purchase will come true. Al-Nabulsi says that the smell is similar to the smell of cloves in a dream, as it indicates obtaining gains. Moral, in addition to obtaining many halal sources. You may also be interested in: The penguin in a dream. The interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream according to Imam Fahd Al-Usaimi. The smell of perfume is evidence of the dreamer’s good behavior among people, in addition to his high morals. As for unpleasant perfumes: they indicate bad speech that It is seen in the sight of people, and it also indicates a person’s bad reputation. Imam Fahd Al-Usaimi says that the smell generally indicates good health, as well as the next batch. Interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream Buying perfumes in a dream indicates great comfort and relief for the chest after a period of Suffering and distress

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a pig in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing pigs in a dream: According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, a pig in a dream indicates a person who has many qualities, most of which are bad qualities. It is known that eating pork is forbidden, and that the pig is a dirty animal, and it has been scientifically proven that eating its meat causes many diseases. Seeing a pig in a dream by Ibn Sirin This animal in a dream by Ibn Sirin has many interpretations. The first interpretation: The coming of the enemy is bad for the dreamer, but it is characterized by With the panic of quarrels and fighting with people. The second interpretation: We find in our lives a large number of people whose personalities are distorted because of their hideous characteristics. Therefore, a pig in a dream expresses one of those dirty qualities, which is courage, knowing that Ibn Sirin mentioned this quality in general. Her husband’s generosity to her, she longs for more than that, and this is what is known as temptation, and a man may see a pig in a dream as an expression of not seeing the blessings that he has. The third interpretation: That God makes the dreamer one of the princes or presidents who will rule over people of a religion other than their Islamic religion, or He takes over a non-Muslim country. Fourth interpretation: Sometimes pigs (sons of pigs) appear in a dream, and if the dreamer dreams of them as if the door of his house was open and they began to enter it one by one, then this is a sign that he will soon be chosen. Working in the court of the Sultan or in the palace of the king or the president, and he must know that the job he will be assigned to is not easy, and he must be careful and careful in every step they take inside the place where the king is. Fifth interpretation: If the pig is in the dreamer’s house and the dreamer does not accept its presence. This animal is in his house and with all his might he took it out of it. This is a sign that he did not live in his work with the president or the king, and God will write down his livelihood for him in another place and work. Sixth interpretation: Pig’s milk in a dream means depriving the dreamer of the greatest blessing that God has given to man, which is logic and wisdom. And the way he manages things, and he may go crazy. Escaping from a pig in a dream by Ibn Sirin. A man escaping from a pig, whether he is married or single in a dream, is a sign that he will escape from trouble. If he is accused of perjury, God will soon take him out of the dock. Health and wellness. Interpretation of seeing a pig in a dream: Raising a pig in a dream, or owning it, is evidence of forbidden profit, or usury, and if the dreamer sees that he is tending a group of pigs, this is evidence that he is leading a people away from his family. If the dreamer dreams that he is riding On the back of a pig, this is good news about victory over an enemy or he will gain a certain position or power. If a man sees in his dream that he is walking like a pig, this is good news for the dreamer that he will gain health and strength in his life. If a man sees a pig in a dream, this may be evidence of The presence of an unfair enemy in his life, but in the event that there is a man riding on the back of a pig, this is good news for the man, as there is a lot of money on his way to him. If a single man sees a pig in his dream, this is evidence that he will marry a woman, and she will not agree

title: The 50 most important interpretations of a dream about eating fruit in a dream

preview.html: Eating fruit in a dream Fruit in a dream symbolizes good things and happy news. Seeing it in a dream brings many benefits to the dreamer, but this vision depends on the condition of the fruit and the condition of the viewer, and not all of its interpretations are good, as it is one of the dreams that have many interpretations. Eating fruit in a dream Seeing someone eating fruit in a dream indicates useful things that he will acquire The dreamer. This vision suggests goodness and blessing in distress. This vision also shows the achievement of the goals and ambitions that the dreamer dreamed of and indicates a mood of worries, psychological problems, disagreements between friends and family, improving relationships, living quietly and with a feeling of stability and security. If one sees fruits falling on him, this means that he will get rid of all his problems, stress, and excessive thinking about things. Useless, tense and frustrated, and that is a period full of happiness, joy and psychological stability. And preparation will come for him again until he rises and begins to plan his life and achieve the goals that he dreamed of, and this vision also shows that God Almighty loves this person and wants to save him from this period that affected himself. The beginning of a new life full of pleasing God. Seeing eating fruit in a dream for a person working in trade indicates that his trade will bring a lot of profit and the dream promises him the profits he will receive in the coming period, and all of this is due to diligence in work and effort, perseverance and determination to succeed in work. Seeing a person Offering fruits to another person is a sign of the good deeds performed by the dreamer, in addition to being a person dedicated to the duties of God Almighty and helping many people. This vision is a mercy from God Almighty to the dreamer and gives him good news of what is coming. Seeing a man eating rotten fruit in a dream is a sign that he commits many daily mistakes in addition to the inappropriate decisions he makes, which will cause many problems in his life. Another interpretation of this dream indicates To the forbidden money that this man earns and brings with illegal and forbidden jobs. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specialized in the interpretation of dreams in the Arab world, just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Eating fruit in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that Fruits in a dream are good and promising dreams for the dreamer and help many needy people. Eating fruit in a man’s dream indicates many goals that the dreamer was able to achieve in his life and reach the highest places thanks to diligence, struggle, and hard work. This vision foretells that he will achieve many gains in the coming days. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a person distributing fruit in a dream means that this person is asking for good. He collected lawful money and the date of his marriage to a good and kind girl is approaching. If in a dream there is a person intending to eat figs, this indicates the problems that this person will fall into in the coming period, and this period will be dangerous for him.
